name: Atlas (itch) (Aerop Industries)
description:
Atlas still has a long way to go till it's finished, so any feedback would help further development. 

The gameplay at the moment consists of movement features, medium-range AI, and player weapons. This is just a small portion of the project made for testing and feedback.

Let me know in the comments about the following:

-game flow

-bugs

-anything to improve on in this first stage of development
